==Descriptions==
{{Description|The ancient tree that should have slumbered forever under the ice and snow has sprouted scarlet sprouts anew. Offer Crimson Agates scattered all over Dragonspine to this tree, and you may obtain rich rewards in return...|[[Map]] description}}
